content:
when I create a dataverse from web UI, the category needs to be chosen show in the following image
image.png

my question is how can I modify the name of dataverse categories, can I define my own dataverse categories?

Well, is this a category that we should add to the software for everyone?

Here's where we added a couple categories: adds "Laboratory" and "Research Group" to list of Dataverse categories #3070
@Philip Durbin no, the category is what we need individually, we want to customize the category showed in the system for us
I see. Well, I would recommend creating an issue asking to make this configurable. Currently these categories are hard-coded.
ok, it would be great if it can be configurable, thanks
Ok, please feel free to create an issue: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues

Hello @shan ,
as Philip mentioned the categories are hard coded, there is already an issue : https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/9420 , feel free to add details &/or a +1 to it :grinning:.
@Dimitri Szabo thanks, I linked back to this thread from the issue. I had forgotten about it.
I've just created another issue #11160 as I've been asked to enable using a different term for our internal org units.
Adding "division" makes sense to me. I just left a reply. Thanks.
